ygData.subject: RE: Screech
ygData.msgSnippet: I think this is due to the fact that you re not close enough.  I ve had the same thing happen to me fighting a handful of creatures.  I get the graphic but
ygData.messageBody:
I think this is due to the fact that you're not close enough. I've had the
same thing happen to me fighting a handful of creatures. I get the
"graphic" but no message whatsoever (even though I'm in melee range). I
usually just take a few steps closer and let it pulse again, then it seems
to take effect.

Desmei Sightblinder
Lvl 28 Bard (Povar)

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 06, 1999 10:07 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Screech


From: <kim@...>

On Wed, 6 Oct 1999, John Robertson wrote:
>
> I'd describe the range of screech as "very small", but it
> seems to vary I've found. I can be hitting cyclopses with
> melee and they can be hitting me, and they're somehow
> outside the range of the song. But with giants, they seem
> to be affected from outside melee range.

I've found that with high blue or higher mobs, there's a
chance of this song simply not affecting them. You see the
light effects, but there's no message of any type. I've had
this happen with cyclopses, Droon, giants, mammoths, griffons,
and a couple others (including one indoor mob). If I keep the
song going, eventually it either works or I get a resist
message, even though neither of us have moved. The higher
/con the mob, the greater the chance of this happening. I'm
not sure if this is a bug or a feature...

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
